monster.name: Ape

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 317, Tales from the Yawning Portal, Tomb of Annihilation, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Ghosts of Saltmarsh
